players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana and found she's the mafia. Vote her out."
Diana: "Alice, why would you investigate me? You must be lying. Bob, you are suspicious."
Bob: "Alice, you claim to have investigated Diana. But you didn't mention any other info. I think you might be mafia."
Diana: "Bob, you are suspicious. Alice is lying. Vote Alice."
Bob: remained silent.
You: "I investigated Diana and found her mafia. Bob, your silence and accusation of me are suspicious. Vote Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
